verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nearer my God to thee
Nearer to thee
Even though it be a cross
That raiseth me
still all my song shall be
Nearer my God to thee
Nearer to thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though Night steal over me
my rest a stone
As ov' r the patriarch
Weary and lone
Yet in my dreams I' d be
Nearer my God to thee
Nearer, to thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There let the way appear
Steps unto heaven
All that thou sendest me
In mercy given
Angels to beckon me
Nearer , my God to thee
Nearer to thee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Then, all my walking thoughts
Bright with thy praise
Out of the stony rock
bethel i will raise
so by my woes to be
Nearer , my God to thee
Nearer to thee

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Till in my father's house
Perfectly blest
After my journeying
safe and at rest
All my delight shall be
Ever, my God , with thee
Ever, with thee.
